other_tests.findings: The extrahepatic bile ducts are markedly dilated with the common bile duct measuring up to 16 mm. The central intrahepatic ducts are moderately dilated, the peripheral intrahepatic ducts are normal. Multiple small non-enhancing cystic lesions of the pancreatic body and tail noted, the largest measuring 12 x 6 mm. Numerous tiny subcentimeter lesions of the liver consistent with biliary hamartomas or cysts. No solid pancreatic mass detected.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings are not significantly changed from prior ERCP or MR abdomen.
